emptyState.createOrImportTip: No albums - create or import one

name.name: Key sound album name
name.errorMessage: You must set a name for the key sound album

notify.noKeySoundsToEdit: No key sounds available to edit
notify.selectSoundEffectForKeys: Please select SFX for the selected per-key {keys}-
notify.confirmDeleteSingleKeyEffect: Are you sure you want to delete the per-key SFX?
notify.confirmDeleteSingleKeyEffectMessage: In your current configuration, press and release SFX are empty, so this modification equals deletion
notify.endTimeGreaterThanStartTime: The end time must be later than the start time
notify.selectAudioFile: Please select an audio source file
notify.downSoundInvalid: Failed: 'Press sound' does not meet requirements
notify.upSoundInvalid: Failed: 'Release sound' does not meet requirements
notify.keyAlreadySelected: Recorded keys are in the selection
notify.partialSingleKeySoundEffectConfigSuccess: Only some per-key SFX config succeeded

tooltip.critical: This item's direct dependencies have been deleted
tooltip.info: This item's dependency chain contains indirect issues (1-layer)
tooltip.low: This item's dependency chain contains indirect issues (multi-layer)

loadAudioFile.title: Load Audio Files
loadAudioFile.description: Load original audio files for subsequent steps
loadAudioFile.dragAndDrop: Click to select or drag-and-drop files here
loadAudioFile.addAsNeeded: Add files as needed per your production preferences
loadAudioFile.emptyFileName: Empty filename may increase management complexity

defineSounds.title: Crop Define Sounds
defineSounds.description: Crop and define required sounds from loaded audio files

tooltip.noImpactOnSource: Sounds created here won't affect source files.
tooltip.multipleSoundsFromSameSource: Multiple independent sounds can be created from the same source file.
tooltip.soundDuration: The start time and end time of the sound, in milliseconds. Since it is used for key presses, the duration should not be too long.
tooltip.volume_1: Of course, you can also manually input to make a more detailed adjustment, such as 0.0001, etc. Please preview again after each volume adjustment to check the effect, to prevent the volume from being too small or too large.
tooltip.previewSound: The sounds used for key presses are usually very short, so the sounds from consecutive previews will play concurrently and will not provide a progress bar or stop button (if necessary, you can restart this application to stop them). Therefore, please follow the principles of sound definition.

craftKeySounds.title: Create Key Sounds
craftKeySounds.description: This step defaults to creating key sounds based on the defined sounds.

error.singleMode: Single mode allows only one sound

tooltip.description_0: Each key can have both press and release sounds.
tooltip.description_2: You can define them according to your needs.
tooltip.description_3: You can define both, just one of them, or neither.
tooltip.inheritKeySound: Inherit configurations from other key sounds
tooltip.inheritRule: Down sound inherits down config, up sound inherits up config

linkageEffects.title: Album Core Effects(SFX)
linkageEffects.description: Configure key linkage effects to automatically trigger preset sounds on press and release keys

global.description: Set a unified global sound effect directly without specifying any keys.

single.description: Specify one or more keys for independent SFX settings.

dialog.selectKeyAndEffect: Select keys and their SFX settings.
dialog.noSingleKeyEffects: No per-key SFX keys set yet

tooltips.description: "Audio files", "Preset sounds", "Ultimate key sounds" can be used as effects to link with keys.
tooltips.testSound:
KeyTone has embedded a global sound effect for testing purposes, allowing users to check if the software is running normally.
It is enabled by default and can be manually turned off if needed. The playback priority is lower than the global/per-key sound effect settings.
tooltips.globalPriority: Higher priority than test sounds, lower than per-key settings

ultimateKeySound.title: Ultimate Key Sound
ultimateKeySound.tooltip: This anchoring only applies when using Ultimate Key Sounds

tooltips.audioFile: Support setting the audio source files as SFX
tooltips.soundList: Support setting pre-defined sound clips as SFX
tooltips.keySounds:
Support setting the ultimate key sounds as SFX.
If this option is selected, an anchoring function for the ultimate key sound will be automatically provided.
This feature is designed to facilitate your operation, but you can also unanchor it to define the SFX more freely.
tooltips.fastDelete: You can also use the empty press/release SFX settings to quickly batch delete keys.
tooltips.delete: Delete press and release SFX for current per-key

confirmSignature.title: Require a signature?
confirmSignature.description: This album has no signature yet. Do you want to add a signature for this export?

authRequire.title: Require authorization for secondary creation?
authRequire.description: Should others be required to obtain your authorization before re-exporting or modifying?
authRequire.recommend: Recommended: No authorization required (better for sharing)

authImpact.title: Impact of enabling authorization
authImpact.message: Enabling 'authorization required for secondary creation' stops others from exporting this album without approval but does not limit their local edits. Exported files still keep your author info even if you leave it off. Continue?

contact.title: Provide contact for authorization
contact.description: Please enter a valid email and optionally add other contact methods (social media, website, etc.).
contact.emailRequired: Email is required when authorization is enabled
contact.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address
contact.additionalPlaceholder: Add social media, website, or other contact info
contact.hint: These details are stored with the signature so requesters can reach you

policyDialog.title: Signature Policy & Requirements
policyDialog.description: Please confirm how to handle signature and authorization requirements for this album
policyDialog.requireSignatureHint: Add signature to identify creator (optional on first export)
policyDialog.noSignatureHint: Export album without signature (optional on first export only; later changes require signature)
policyDialog.authRequired: Secondary creation must be authorized by current signature author
policyDialog.authRequiredHint: Once enabled, others must get authorization before re-exporting this album. This choice cannot be changed.
policyDialog.tips:
â€¢ First export of albums without signatures can choose whether to add signature
â€¢ Once signature is added, all future changes require signature
â€¢ With authorization enabled, others cannot export until authorized

test.title: ğŸ§ª Export Flow Test Environment
test.description: Configure test scenarios to verify the UI and interaction logic of the export flow. Choose different album state combinations and observe the sequence and content of dialogs displayed in the flow.
test.hasSignatureHint: Check if this album previously had signature history. Otherwise the Confirm Signature dialog will be shown.
test.requireAuth: Original author requires authorization for secondary creation
test.requireAuthHint: Only valid when 'has signature' is checked. Indicates the original author chose 'authorization required for secondary creation', which will show the auth gate dialog.

authGateDialog.title: Authorization Required
authGateDialog.description: This album requires authorization before export
authGateDialog.contactHint: Contact the author through the following to get authorization
authGateDialog.importHint: Please import the authorization file from the author to continue

pickerDialog.title: Select Signature
pickerDialog.description: Select the signature to use for this export

signatureUpdateConfirm.title: Update Signature Confirmation
signatureUpdateConfirm.message: The selected signature has changes compared to the one already in the album. Do you want to update the signature details (intro, image)?

form.editWarning: After editing a signature, if you need to update the signature in albums already signed with this signature, you need to re-export the signature for those albums.
form.name: Signature Name
form.imageHint: Supports PNG, JPEG, WebP, GIF and other image formats

export.confirmWarning: Please keep your signature file secure and do not send it to others!
export.confirmDetail: Anyone who has your signature file can import and use it to sign operations. Please ensure that your signature file is stored in a secure location.
export.riskItem1: â€¢ Do not share your signature file with others
export.riskItem2: â€¢ Do not upload your signature file to public networks
export.riskItem3: â€¢ Back up your signature file to prevent loss

import.title: Import Signature
import.fileHint: Please select a KeyTone signature file (.ktsign)
import.conflictMessage: Signature "{name}" already exists. Do you want to overwrite it?

select.title: Select Signature
select.description: Choose a signature for this album to identify the creator
